info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 03 at 5:48PM EDT until May 03 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Robeson County in southeastern North Carolina... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 548 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Prospect, or near Red Springs, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. * Locations impacted include... Red Springs, Pembroke, Buie, Wakulla, Prospect, Shannon and Rennert. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
